'''''What Does This Button Do?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to shoot a few times when operating a [[Ruin Golem]].

The following Ruin Golems can award this achievement:
# The [[Ruin Golem (Valley of Dahri)|Ruin Golem]] in the Valley of Dahri, unlocked during the World Quest ''[[Afratu's Dilemma]]''
# The [[Ruin Golem (Desert of Hadramaveth)|Ruin Golem]] in the Wounded Shin Valley, unlocked during the World Quest ''[[Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part III]]''.
